Conjuration 4

Ghost General

EA Yomi,  MA Shinuyama,  LA Jomon

Ritual
D3
spell id [id]: 453
effect number [effect_number]: 21
damage [damage]: 1256
spec [spec]: 8388608
number of effects [nreff]: 1
gems required [gemcost]: 10D
Summon Commander:#1256 Shura
 
(May Use Underwater [uwok])
This spell summons a Shura, or warrior ghost, from the Underworld. The Shura is the vengeful ghost of a general slain by treason. The Shura appears as a horrible ghostly samurai armed with a sickly green blade that causes living bodies to shrivel and die.
